meanings: (어떤 자리·장면에서 느껴지는 느낌) atmosphere, mood, air, ambience
an atmosphere conducive to academic pursuit

vlive.korean: [갑자기 분위기 브로맨스] 저요? [Suddenly bromance] Me? 듣기 View video ASTRO : [ASTRO PLAY] 2020 ASTRO Live on WWW.
여름 음악이랑 분위기 맞는 거 같아요. I feel like it really soothes the summer vibe. 듣기 View video Stray Kids : 찬이의 "방" 🐺 Ep. 63
vlive.english: I feel like it really soothes the summer vibe.

vlive.korean: 짱 좋아요, 분위기가... It's awesome. The mood... 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 수빈&범규의 티타임 🥑🍍
잠깐만요 - 갑자기 게임으로 이렇게 분위기가... Wait a minute. - The mood changed so suddenly... 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 헹가래의 끝은 안드로메다🚀
vlive.english: Wait a minute. - The mood changed so suddenly...

vlive.korean: 이 계절에, 이 분위기에 딱 어울리는 메뉴 아닙니까 여러분들? Isn't it the best menu for this season and mood? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] AB6IX x Rooftop Live - AB6IX의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: Isn't it the best menu for this season and mood?

examples.korean: The whole town is in festive mood. 발음듣기 그 소도시 전체가 축제 분위기이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The whole town is in festive mood. 발음

examples.korean: an atmosphere redolent of the sea and ships 발음듣기 바다와 배를 생각나게 하는 분위기 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: an atmosphere redolent of the sea and ships 발음

examples.korean: The overall tone of the book is gently nostalgic. 발음듣기 그 책의 전반적인 분위기는 약간 회고조이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The overall tone of the book is gently nostalgic. 발음

examples.korean: The scent of victory was in the air. 발음듣기 (분위기 속에는) 승리의 기운이 감돌았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The scent of victory was in the air. 발음

examples.korean: The meeting ended on an upbeat note. 발음듣기 그 회의는 긍정적인 분위기로 끝났다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The meeting ended on an upbeat note. 발음
